summary: This memorandum discusses the decision to use a specific safehouse for AMMUG-1, located at Hunting Towers, Mt. Vernon Blvd. Apt. #731-West, Alexandria. It outlines the agreement with Mr. (Ray Scofield), the inspection of the apartment, and the plan to move A-1 into the safehouse after debriefing. The memo also mentions informing Mr. (John Ryan) about the change in plans regarding prospective apartments for A-1.
title: Memorandum for the Record: Safehouse for AMMUG-1
